name: otf-api-monorepo
description: OrangeTheory Fitness API - Python and TypeScript libraries

scripts.build: npm run sync && npm run build:python && npm run build:typescript
scripts.build:python: cd python && uv run python -m build
scripts.test: npm run test:generation && npm run test:python && npm run test:typescript
scripts.test:generation: npm run test:schema-generation && npm run test:ts-generation
scripts.test:schema-generation: cd python && uv run pytest tests/test_schema_generation.py -v
scripts.test:ts-generation: cd typescript && npm run test -- schema-generation.test.ts
scripts.lint: npm run lint:python && npm run lint:typescript
scripts.lint:python: cd python && uv run ruff check --fix && uv run ruff format
scripts.sync: npm run generate-schema && npm run generate-ts
scripts.validate: npm run sync && npm run test:generation
